nodes.bodyText: Note that "the general case" is actually just the specific "OtherAttribute" case
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1298,13 +1298,25 @@ and m_list__m_attribute (xsa: A.attribute list) (xsb: A.attribute list) =
       with Not_found -> fail ()
       )
   (*e: [[Generic_vs_generic.m_list__m_attribute]] [[NamedAttr]] pattern case *)
-  (* the general case *)

nodes.bodyText:
better to remove the body of m_list__m_attribute and call
m_list_in_any_order ... in it that way all the places where we look for attributes will have this new behavior.
(need to check the possible perf regression when applied to all the instances).

     m_ident_and_id_info_add_in_env_Expr (a1, a5) (b1, b5) >>= (fun () ->
-    (m_list__m_attribute) a2 b2 >>= (fun () ->
